attributes.action: UK government and monarchy to stand down and give power back to the people.
attributes.background:
The UK government has failed the British people and we are tired of nothing changing for the better.
They have systematically mislead and manipulated the people of the UK to suit a separate agenda of their own, time and time again.
This has to stop.
We can't let them ruin this country.

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government and Parliament to take. For example, we are not sure whether you would like another general election to take place, or whether you would like a different system of power entirely.
